page.title: 06DAIRY FARMING-LILLESHALL
page.content: Out of the four farms visited only one was completely {Dairy.}It was 90 acres so the fields were smaller making it unsuitable for big machinery.Because of the 76 cattle and silage it is rather smelly.There was one full-time and one part-time worker.He had tractors,silage harvesters as well as a milking parlour,dairy,barns, calf sheds. {Mixed.}The mixed farm we visited had an acreage of 470.The farmer keeps 97 cattle,milking 3 times a day.He has 65 sheep and also grows wheat,oats,barley ,maize,lucerne,peas as well as silage for the cattle.He has 4 full-time and 1 part-time workmen.He has a milking parlour,barns,calf sheds,cattle sheds and a silage shed as well as his machinery.
